name: Tetro Squares
description:
An intuitive, 2D, puzzle game where you move on a grid to reach the end goal. However, when you pass directly next to a block, it attaches itself to you and results in it moving along with you. You must then use this mechanic of blocks attaching to you to navigate through various levels, with the goal of creating  specific polyominoes (shapes made up of multiple equally sized squares) at the end of the level.

But attachable blocks are not the only thing you'll come into contact with throughout the level
